attributes.action: Re-introduce the death penalty for Paedophiles
attributes.additional_details:
At the hands of Paedophiles, Countless innocent children have their ENTIRE lives destroyed and affected forever.

The people who have taken their time to add their signatures to this petition agree that the death penalty should be re-introduced as a fair punishment for those convicted of paedophilia, where there is evidence which proves guilt beyond any reasonable doubt.

(An example of this is the evidence for a pop star and two un-named women who are on trial with him).

Paedophiles often escape just punishment for heinous crimes against children by manipulating the Human Rights Act, regardless of the fact they have stolen and destroyed the human rights of a vulnerable child.

Tax payers which include those who have been victims of such crimes should not be expected to fund prison places for such evil crimes.
